# d3-downloadable

Make SVG downloadable.

## Install

```bash
$ npm install d3-downloadable
```

## Usage

```javascript
import * as d3 from 'd3'
import {downloadable} from 'd3-downloadable'

d3.select('svg#chart')
  .call(downloadable())
```

## Example

http://likr.github.io/d3-downloadable
